titleStmt.title: An aunsweare vnto certayne assertions, tending to maintaine the Church of Rome, to be the true and Catholique Church. By Iohn Knewstub
titleStmt.author: Knewstubs, John, 1544-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: at the three Cranes in the Vintree, by Thomas Dawson for Richard Sergier,

notesStmt.note: An edition of: Knewstubs, John. An aunsweare unto certaine assertions.
Running title reads: A confutation on the principall points of poperie.
Identified as STC 15041 on UMI microfilm reel 640.
Folger Shakespeare Library copy imperfect; title page lacking.
Reproductions of the originals in the Folger Shakespeare Library and the British Library.
Appears at reel 640 #6 (Folger Shakespeare Library copy, identified as STC 15041), and at reel 712 (British Library copy).

place.placeName: the three Cranes in the Vintree
